pages.title: Buried Treasure Map
pages.text: $(li)The Buried Treasure Map is a item that can be found in the $(l:patchouli:structures/tower)Towers$(/l) or $(l:patchouli:structures/shipwreck)Shipwrecks$(/l).$(br)$(li)$(l:patchouli:villagers/cartographer)Cartographers$(/l) will trade you their maps by your $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/emerald)Emeralds.$(/l)$(br)$(li)They will indicate you the route to a place with a hidden $(l:patchouli:perks/loot_chest)Loot Chest$(/l).

$(li)If you have this map in your offhand slot and give a $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/alexsmobs/lobster_tail)Lobster Tail$(/l) to a $(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/seagull)Seagull$(/l), it will indicate the localization of the $(l)Buried Treasure$().
